about.title: About Us
about.description: The association is a non-profit organization pursuing civic, solidarity and social utility purposes. Through volunteer work, we provide various services to our associates, their families, and third parties.
activities: Scientific research of particular social interest
Organization and management of cultural activities
Extra-school training aimed at preventing early school leaving
Social housing and temporary residential activities
Humanitarian reception and social integration of migrants
Charity and support for disadvantaged people
Promotion of the culture of legality and peace among peoples
specificList: Perform cultural and linguistic mediation at public entities
Organize Italian language courses for immigrants
Create workshops on Italian culture, customs, and traditions
Organize events on immigrant rights and responsibilities
Promote events concerning the fundamental principles of the Italian Constitution
Organize Italian language courses and cultural workshops in countries of origin
Campaign against illegal immigration and promote legal immigration
Provide support and guidance on immigration matters
Assist with immigration paperwork and procedures
Provide legal support on immigration issues
Collaborate with trade associations and institutions to promote workplace safety
Organize cultural events to introduce other cultures to Italians
Organize Italian cultural events in countries of origin
